profile:
Maconnerie Montreal has been in the stone and masonry brick business since 2001, and the company has gone from being a sole trader to one of the leading masonry contractors in Montreal. We are now well respected across the city for our work ethic, attention to detail, and the great results that we have delivered for our customers.

We specialise in stone and brickwork, for both external and internal surfaces and we work on residential and commercial properties. Whatever your requirements are, if it involves stone or brick then we will be able to help. Our aim is always to help customers get the most out of their investment, and a key part of our service is helping you plan your stone and brick work, ensuring that the end result is exactly how you imagined it, and that our work complements your property. We never sign on a project until the customer is entirely happy.

As part of our service, we guarantee the following:

A detailed estimate, including quantities of materials and any additional costs.
An itemized plan, outlining the exact steps that will be taken.
Use of state of the art equipment, handled by skilled stonemasons.
Expert staff and bricklayers to handle the project from concept to completion.
Speedy completion, taking the time required to do a good job while carrying out the project quickly and efficiently.
We are proud of the quality of stonemasons we employ, as they are all highly trained and experienced, and they are always happy to offer bricklaying tips to help our clients keep their masonry in top condition.

We have a wide variety of clients, and we have worked on everything from small residential to large commercial projects. We can take on projects from Laval and the North Shore all the way down to Longueuil and the South Shore, and our team is out each day carrying out stone and masonry brick work across Montreal.

For more information about our services please just click here, or alternatively give us a call on (514) 316-3165.
hours: from Monday to Friday from 10 am to 5 pm
name: Maconneire Montreal

profile:
Vous avez remarqué quelques fissures sur votre mur de briques? N'attendez pas que la situation s'aggrave et agissez dès maintenant! Chez C.B.A. Maçonnerie, nos briqueteurs professionnels sont là pour répondre à vos besoins. 

Nos services

- Agrandissement et ouverture de portes et fenêtre
- Solin d'étanchéité
- Fer d'angles
- Réparation de joints de briques
- Restauration de maçonnerie
- Crépis
- Allèges architecturaux
-Etc

Pour une estimation ou des conseils avisés, contactez-nous!
